channel.title: How to make a special attack stronger in wild
channel.description:
ok i want to make a aramdyl god sword hit amazing with spec in wild. but not on npcs. like say i make a pure with 1 str 70 attack. ill hit 1s with normal attack but when i use spec on npc it hits 1s. but if i use spec in wild ill hit like 50s. please help
thanks.

item.title: How to make a special attack stronger in wild
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:9, topic:266636”]Find the wild coords, and then do:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746 && specialAmount > 74 && playerxpos=#### ¦¦ playerypos=####){
stillgfx(369, EnemyY, EnemyX);
stillgfx(644, absY, absX);
specialAtk(false, 75, 600, 2927);
getHit(30);
AttackingOn2.EntangleDelay = 5;
}else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746 && specialAmount > 74){
stillgfx(369, EnemyY, EnemyX);
stillgfx(644, absY, absX);
specialAtk(false, 75, 600, 2927);
getHit(0);
AttackingOn2.EntangleDelay = 5;
}

Or something.[/quote]
Please don’t post if you don’t know what you’re talking about.

On Topic -
Just change your special attack methods for player vs player.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a special attack stronger in wild

item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

im going to o.o
for bowzer in client.java you should see something like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746 && specialAmount > 74){ stillgfx(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); stillgfx(644, absY, absX); specialAtk(false, 75, 600, 2927); getHit(0); AttackingOn2.EntangleDelay = 5; } if you switch the “getHit(0);” to a bit higher, the spec SHOULD hit higher, post back if it doesnt or pm me.
